title: Stake
quote: Deposit your ETH on NEXLayer, which gets staked via DVT.

title: Restake
quote: The staked tokens get natively restaked on NEXLayer to receive restaked points.

title: Earn
quote: Receive xETH in your wallet. Earn staking rewards,restaked points.

title: Defi
quote: Lend or borrow against your xETH and multiply your yield.
